data.name: [RESX:PDS:TableName].Text
data.value: Enter Name of Table or View

data.name: [RESX:PostOrderInstructions:Hint].Text
data.value: The text that you enter the area below will appear on the final order page for the user.

data.name: [RESX:ProductGroup].Help
data.value: An optional field that will allow you to better organize products.

data.name: [RESX:ProductName].Help
data.value: A brief name for your product.

data.name: [RESX:ProductSKU].Help
data.value: A brief sequence of letters and numbers to help keep products unique and provide better reporting options.

data.name: [RESX:ProductPage].Help
data.value: An optional field that will allow users to access more details about your product.

data.name: [RESX:Price].Help
data.value: The price you wish people to pay for this product.

data.name: [RESX:Cost].Help
data.value: Enter the cost for this item to help with reporting.

data.name: [RESX:ShipFee].Help
data.value: Enter the fee you would like to charge for shipping this product.

data.name: [RESX:Active].Help
data.value: Determines whether or not a product is available for purchase.

data.name: [RESX:Visible].Help
data.value: This option allows control over the general visibility of the product.

data.name: [RESX:RequireShipAddress].Help
data.value: Select this option if the product must be shipped to the customer.

data.name: [RESX:ShortDescription].Help
data.value: Enter a brief, plain text or html description for you product.

data.name: [RESX:AllowedRoles].Help
data.value: Select the roles that are allowed to purchase this item.

data.name: [RESX:AddToRoles].Help
data.value: Select the roles which the customer should be added to after completing a purchase.

data.name: [RESX:CustomAction].Help
data.value: Enter the class name followed by the assembly that will be used to carry out custom actions.

data.name: [RESX:SendEmail].Help
data.value: Select a specific email template that should be send to the customer when this product is purchased.

data.name: [RESX:Description].Help
data.value: Provide a brief description to help identify this discount.

data.name: [RESX:DiscountCode].Help
data.value: The discount code should be a short sequence of letters and numbers to be used for applying a discount.

data.name: [RESX:RequireDiscountCode].Help
data.value: A discount without a discount code or when the discount code is not required will be automatically applied to products or the entire purchase if applicable.

data.name: [RESX:Restriction].Help
data.value: Select the restriction that you would applied to this discount.

data.name: [RESX:Amount].Help
data.value: Fixed amount that you would like to offer as the discount.

data.name: [RESX:Percent].Help
data.value: Enter the percentage amount to be applied to the discount.

data.name: [RESX:MaxUsePerUser].Help
data.value: Enter the maximum number of times a discount can be applied for a single user.

data.name: [RESX:MaxUseTotal].Help
data.value: Enter the maximum number of total times a discount can be used. This allows you to create discounts that can be used up to a certain number of times while taking into account the number of times a user has redeemed the discount.

data.name: [RESX:Enabled].Help
data.value: Make sure the discount is enable in order for it to be applied.

data.name: [RESX:Actions:DeleteConfirm].Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to delete this item?

data.name: [RESX:OrderNumber].Help
data.value: The starting number to be used for invoices.

data.name: [RESX:Confirm:Delete].Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to delete this item?

data.name: [RESX:OrderStatus:Info].Text
data.value: Select one of the entries above to edit an existing item or enter a value in the box below. Click the save button when you are ready to save your changes.

data.name: [RESX:PaymentAssembly].Help
data.value: Enter the name of the assembly that is located in your bin directory that will handle your payment processing.

data.name: [RESX:PaymentClass].Help
data.value: Enter the full name of the class that is within the assembly you specified above that will be used to process payments.

data.name: [RESX:PaymentOptions].Help
data.value: Select the payment options that you will accept.

data.name: [RESX:Tax:Info].Text
data.value: Enter a new tax rate by selecting an identifier then enter an appropriate qualifying value followed by a rate. For example, if you wanted to charge 8% sales tax for all order in the State of California you would select State for the identifier then enter CA for the Qualifier followed by 8.0 for the rate.

data.name: [RESX:Discount:Error:CodeAlreadyExists].Text
data.value: The discount code you entered is already in use.

data.name: [RESX:Discount:Error:DescriptionRequired].Text
data.value: Please enter a description for this discount.

data.name: [RESX:Discount:Error:InvalidDiscountAmount].Text
data.value: Please enter a valid discount amount.

data.name: [RESX:Product:Error:NameRequired].Text
data.value: Please enter a name for this product.

data.name: [RESX:Product:Error:SKURequired].Text
data.value: Please enter a unique sku for this product.

data.name: [RESX:Confirm:OrderActions].Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to run the post order actions again?

data.name: [RESX:Confirm:ResendEmail].Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to email the order details to this customer?

data.name: [RESX:Error:FailedToLoadOrder].Text
data.value: There was an error retrieving the order.

data.name: [RESX:CollectShip].Help
data.value: Choose whether or not you wish to collect a shipping fee for items in the store.

data.name: [RESX:CollectTax].Help
data.value: Choose whether or not you wish to collect sales tax for items in the store.

data.name: [RESX:Currency].Help
data.value: Select the currency that will be used within the store.

data.name: [RESX:CustomerOrderDetails].Help
data.value: Select the email template you would like to use for sending customers a summary of their order.

data.name: [RESX:CustomerPendingPayment].Help
data.value: Select the email template you would like to use for notifying a customer that their order is pending payment.

data.name: [RESX:CustomerWelcome].Help
data.value: Select the email template you would like to use for welcoming a new customer to the site.

data.name: [RESX:DateFormat].Help
data.value: Select the format you wish to use for displaying date values.

data.name: [RESX:EnableSSL].Help
data.value: Select this option to make ensure orders are processed using SSL.

data.name: [RESX:EndDate].Help
data.value: Enter the date when this discount will no longer be valid.

data.name: [RESX:FromEmail].Help
data.value: The email address that you would like to appear as the sender for emails sent from the store.

data.name: [RESX:NotificationTemplate].Help
data.value: Select the email template you would like to use for sending order notifications.

data.name: [RESX:OrderNotifications].Help
data.value: Select the roles you would like to have notified when a new order is received.

data.name: [RESX:OrderSources].Help
data.value: A comma separated list of options you would like to use for order sources.

data.name: [RESX:PaymentLogin].Help
data.value: Enter the login id for the payment provider.

data.name: [RESX:PaymentPass].Help
data.value: Enter the password or transaction key for the payment provider.

data.name: [RESX:PaymentTestMode].Help
data.value: Select this option if you wish to enable test mode for payment processing.

data.name: [RESX:PayPalLang].Help
data.value: Enter the language you would like to use with PayPal.

data.name: [RESX:PayPalURL].Help
data.value: Enter the PayPal URL you would like to use for processing.

data.name: [RESX:SalesReps].Help
data.value: Select the role that will be used to identify your sales reps.

data.name: [RESX:StartDate].Help
data.value: Enter the date when this discount will become valid.

data.name: [RESX:Taxable].Help
data.value: Select this option if you wish to collect tax for this item.

data.name: [RESX:Theme].Help
data.value: Select the theme you wish to use for the store.

data.name: [RESX:TimeFormat].Help
data.value: Select the format you wish to use for displaying time values.

data.name: [RESX:NoLists].Text
data.value: No lists available for this portal.

data.name: [RESX:DiscountForProductPurchased].Help
data.value: A discount will be applied only if the person has purchased this product previously.

data.name: [RESX:DiscountForProduct].Help
data.value: A discount will applied only to new purchases of this product.

data.name: [RESX:DiscountForSpecificRole].Help
data.value: A discount will be applied only to users in the specified roles

data.name: [RESX:RestrictionType].Help
data.value: Please select the type of restriction you would like to add.

data.name: [RESX:Error:RestrictTypeRequired].Text
data.value: You must select a restriction type.

data.name: [RESX:PaymentURL].Help
data.value: Enter the URL for your Payment Provider gateway.

data.name: [RESX:ProductType].Help
data.value: Billing type determines how the customer will pay for this item. Most products will fall under one-time billing. Products that are part of a subscription will use recurring billing.

data.name: [RESX:Error:DayUnits].Text
data.value: You must enter a value from 7 to 365 for units.

data.name: [RESX:Error:MonthUnits].Text
data.value: You must enter a value from 1 to 12 for units.

data.name: [RESX:Error:InvalidCurrency].Text
data.value: The currency format you have entered is incorrect.

data.name: [RESX:File].Help
data.value: Select the file which you wish to attach to this product.

data.name: [RESX:PurchaseDate].Help
data.value: A customer must have purchased this product after the date you specify in order to have access to download this file.

data.name: [RESX:Title].Help
data.value: Enter the text that you would like displayed for this file.

data.name: [RESX:DataType].Help
data.value: Select the data type you would like to use for this property. This value determines how the value will be captured during the checkout process.

data.name: [RESX:DefaultValue].Help
data.value: If wish to specify a default value for this property you may enter it here.

data.name: [RESX:Error:UserUsageTooLarge].Text
data.value: The maximum number of times a user can redeem this code can not be larger than the total max usage.

data.name: [RESX:IsEnabled].Help
data.value: Select this option to make sure the property is visible to the user during the checkout process.

data.name: [RESX:IsRequired].Help
data.value: Select this option if you wish to make this a required field.

data.name: [RESX:ListName].Help
data.value: Select the list that contains the values you would like to be associated with this property.

data.name: [RESX:PropertyLabel].Help
data.value: Enter the text that you would like to be displayed to the user for this property. This value can later be localized if necessary through Language Editor.

data.name: [RESX:PropertyName].Help
data.value: Enter a name for this property. This will be used to identify the property within the system.

data.name: [RESX:RecInterval].Help
data.value: Select the interval you would like to use to calculate the billing frequency.

data.name: [RESX:RecLength].Help
data.value: Enter the number that will be used along with the interval to calculate the billing frequency.

data.name: [RESX:RecOccurances].Help
data.value: Enter the number of times you would like the person to billed. Enter 9999 if you would like the user to be billed indefinitely.

data.name: [RESX:SelectCustomer].Text
data.value: Please select a customer before editing an address.

data.name: [RESX:ValidationExpression].Help
data.value: You can further enforce input validation by specifying a regular expression.
